title: Ep50: Gallipoli - Evacuation of Helles
itunes:title: Ep50: Gallipoli - Evacuation of Helles
itunes:subtitle: Peter and Gary explore the remarkable evacuation of Cape Helles in January 1916, the final chapter in the Gallipoli saga. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit  or...
description:
Peter and Gary explore the remarkable evacuation of Cape Helles in January 1916, the final chapter in the Gallipoli saga.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
